actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to insure equal protection of the laws as guaranteed by the fifth or fourteenth amendments to the Constitution of the United States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Requires a court of the United States to find discriminatory intent before it can declare any Federal or State action as violative of the fifth or fourteenth amendments to the U.S. Constitution.

titles.title: A bill to insure equal protection of the laws as guaranteed by the fifth or fourteenth amendments to the Constitution of the United States.
